column1: I have to say, I've reviewed the suggestions that "year in x" not be piped, and I vehemently disagree. As I note on the [[Wikipedia talk:Piped link|talk page]], "[s]ee [[Lindsay Lohan]] for a good example of why piping is a good thing (a simple [[2003 in film]] in line would create clunky, hard-to-follow writing—better to use no links at all)." Comment?
